name: NXbrz
author: archerpolation
description:
Category: Art/Pixel Art

Basic pixel art upscaling, for people who want a more simpler style and lightweight pixel art upscaling model.

Sample images: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1mYTMpwDlKQulBmjgKpcxL3-T6xAGXVxl?usp=sharing
dataset: Images upscaled with the Xbrz scaling filter and images upscaled with the ScaleNX filter, combined together to create a mix of both models.
